definition: in confusion or disorder/in a confused state of mind/disorder/upheaval/riot/illicit sexual relations/to throw into disorder/to mix up/indiscriminate/random/arbitrary
to speak/to explain/to negotiate/to emphasise/to be particular about/as far as sth is concerned/speech/lecture

sentences.english: I think you are full of crap, but we do not have tme to debate this.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得你在乱讲，开是我们没有时间去争论。

sentences.english: Some one may babble a lot willingly to kill time.
sentences.chinese: 有些人是为了打发时间，也许会口不择言地乱讲一通。

sentences.english: Randomly says, all not in this world, but also how loves me?
sentences.chinese: 乱讲，都不在这个世界了，还怎样爱我啊？

sentences.english: Nonsense. How could you love me while you were not on the earth?
sentences.chinese: 乱讲，都不在这个世界上了，还怎么爱我？

to talk drivel/to assert sth without a proper understanding or basis in fact/not to know what one is talking about
to boast/to shoot one's mouth off
to make false accusations against sb (idiom)
to make a wild guess/blind guess
to speak without thinking/to blurt sth out
